onboarding_screen_first: Nosotros le guairemos a través de todos los pasos necesarios para  configurar su dispositivo correctamente
first_start_explanation: Para continuar, favor de ingresar los siguientes datos
first_start_ip_hint: Ingresa la Dirección IP de la raspberry Pi aquí
first_start_port_hint: ingresa el Número del puerto de la raspberry aquí
first_start_open_hint: Ingresa el tiempo que desee que la puerta permanezca abierta en segundos
first_start_open_validate: Así es como la puerta permanece cerrada
set_password_explanation:
Para validación ingresa una contraseña,
Por razones de seguridad, debe ser mayor a 7 caracteres
set_password_second_device:
Ya tienes un dispositivo movil?
Haz click en el Código-QR
second_device_explanation: Para agregar un nuevo dispositivo, Escanea el código QR desde las configuraciones de la aplicación del dispositivo principal
change_password_explanation: Escribe la contraseña vieja, después la contraseña nueva
password_auth_explanation:
Aplicación bloqueada
Escribe la contraseña para continuar
password_auth_password_hint: Favor de ingresar la contraseña para continuar
share_credentials_explanation: Favor de ingresar la contraseña para ver el código QR del segundo dispositivo
share_credentials_share_qr: Scan the QR Code in the Door Opener App to get Access to the door.
fingerprint_dialog_explanation: Favor de colocar su dedo el el sensor para auntenticar
home_screen_share_otp: With this key you can open my door one time
otp_screen_explain: Enter the credentials to open the door once
error_screen_error_01:
Lost in the orbit...
The encryption key was not saved on the Raspi Opener
Please press the reset button to start again
error_screen_error_02:
Taken by Strangers...
There is already a password in use, reset the app
and get the QR Code from other members or reset the Raspi Opener to start again
error_screen_error_03:
The encryption key does not match with the encryption key on the PI, reset the app
and get the QR Code from other members or reset the Raspi Opener to start again
error_screen_error_04: The OTP you entered was not found or was already used
error_screen_error_05:
The password you entered does not match with the password on the server, reset the app
and get the QR Code from other members or reset the Raspi Opener to start again
error_screen_error_06:
Could not save new password, reset the app
and get the QR Code from other members or reset the Raspi Opener to start again
error_screen_error_07:
No old password found which could be changed, reset the app
and get the QR Code from other members or reset the Raspi Opener to start again
error_screen_error_08: Could not save OTP try again after checking your Connection
error_screen_error_09:
Something went wrong on the Server which is not defined by us. 
Please create a Issue on Github and if possible provide the log without the IP Addresses
error_screen_error_10:
There occurred an error which is caused due to a wrong command. 
Please create a Issue on Github and if possible provide the log without the IP Addresses
error_screen_error_default:
An error occurred which we do not handle at the moment. 
Please create a Issue on Github and if possible provide the log without the IP Addresses
saved_qr_codes_screen_explanation: Slide the OTP to the left for more actions
